title: The Edition: The cost of net zero
description:
This week on The Edition: 

How expensive will it be to get to net zero and what is the cost of not reaching this goal?(00:48) Also on the podcast: Are international PCR tests a new racket?(17:56) And finally…  is the American Dream dead?(27:39)

With journalists Ross Clark & James Kirkup. Producer Matt Quinton & Virginia Messina the acting CEO of the World Travel and Tourism Council. Writer Sean Thomas & the host of our very popular sister podcast Americano, Freddy Gray.
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
